body_html:
I recently have built and installed caffe2 (exactly pytorch) from source using python 2.7.12 without anaconda virtual environment with following command

$ git clone --recursive https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch.git && cd pytorch
$ git submodule update --init --recursive
$ FULL_CAFFE2=1 NO_CUDA=1 NO_CUDNN=1 python setup.py install

and run the tutorial without errors related to lmdb.

Important point is use of '--recursive--' option in git clone .

ref:

  • caffe2/caffe2#945
  • caffe2/caffe2#1698

Cheers.

and run the tutorial without errors related to lmdb.
Important point is use of '--recursive--' option in git clone .
ref:

Cheers.
body:
I recently have built and installed caffe2 (exactly pytorch) from source using python 2.7.12 without anaconda virtual environment with following command
````sh
$ git clone --recursive https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch.git && cd pytorch
$ git submodule update --init --recursive
$ FULL_CAFFE2=1 NO_CUDA=1 NO_CUDNN=1 python setup.py install
````
and run the tutorial without errors related to lmdb.

Important point is use of '**--recursive--**' option in git clone . 

ref:
- https://github.com/caffe2/caffe2/issues/945
- https://github.com/caffe2/caffe2/pull/1698

Cheers.
